items.title: Palestinian Oscar winner attacked by Israeli settlers then detained, activists say
items.description: Hamdan Ballal was beaten by settlers before being taken away, his No Other Land co-director said.

items.title: Sudan army accused of killing hundreds in airstrike on Darfur market
items.description: Videos posted on social media show the smoking ruins of market stalls and charred bodies.

items.title: Brazil's Supreme Court to decide whether to put Bolsonaro on trial
items.description: Jair Bolsonaro is accused of plotting a coup, but the ex-president says he is the victim of a witch hunt.

items.title: Grandparents arrested on suspicion of toddler's murder in French Alps
items.description: Emile Soleil mysteriously vanished in 2023, in a case that made headlines across France.

items.title: Five takeaways from leaked US top military chat group
items.description: What was discussed in the top-secret group that a journalist was accidentally added to?
